channel.title: And Im back :p
channel.description:
Hello, for like the 4th time today... Sorry for all these threads, but I haven't coded in about 2 years, and I forgot a lot.
I got into the server, and everythings working. Need help with editing some stuff though.
1) Moving the shops to another area 2) Making myself a donator (WILL NOT WORK ffs) 3) Adding in new areas (like picking an area, and adding in new stuff) 4) Changing the training exp rate
This is a 317 btw (like it has a client to play on, but its a 317 base)
Those are the main ones, but Im probably going to think of a few minor ones later on, so keep a close eye on this thread :)
(If anyone wants to be like a part coder with me, and help me code continuously that would be cool)
Anyway, thanks... AGAIN lol

item.title: And Im back :p

item.description:
@own-u wrote:

[quote=“I_AM_LEGEND, post:3, topic:317859”]if its 317

shops moving = autospawn.cfg (im not near my servers computer so i cant really be sure right now)
the shops = i think just looking through anything having the name “shop” in it oyu should find out.

3) Adding in new areas (like picking an area, and adding in new stuff)

do you mean as in your starting off area and stuff?

be more specific i can probably help with all of this[/quote]

Yeah, changing the starting area.

and I don’t seem to have autospawn =\
